ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Medical Module
ModMetaData.author: OskarPotocki, Atlas, Kikohi
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Medical module adds several new pieces of furniture to allow players for higher variety of medical beds and linkables. Sterile walls have also been added with color-coded line markings, allowing users to color-code the rooms.
